lyrics.text:
There'll be joy in the morning on that day, there'll be joy in the morning on that day,
for the daylight will dawn when the darkness is gone, there'll be joy in the morning on that day.

There'll be peace and contentment evermore, there'll be peace and contentment evermore,
every heart, every voice on that day will rejoice, there'll be peace and contentment evermore.

There'll be love and forgiveness everywhere, there'll be love and forgiveness everywhere,
and the way of the Lord will that day be restored, there'll be love and forgiveness everywhere.
